home.title: The Impact of Population Growth Through History.
home.subtitle: How nature is affected by human beings.
home.tip: Turn on sound for the best experience.

about.title: About
about.content:
The initial idea to build this web experience came to mind during the covid-19 pandemic. This virus had a huge impact on our whole population.

Indirectly you could see the amazing side-effects it had on mother nature. The skies became bright blue again and the animals and vegetation flourished.

error.title: Seems like you found another planet.
error.text: Choose another path to continue your journey.
